error.name: ItSeemsThatNodeAccidentallyBlewUpException
error.message:
An error happened and petpet doesn't have an error message for it! You probably found a bug.
If you're not sure what to do, please report this error to %s.

%s

corrupted-file.name: SomethingWeirdHappenedToYourGameFileException
corrupted-file.message:
Your petpet game file appears to be corrupted.
Please delete %s and try again.

write-file-error.name: YourDataFileIsRefusingToBeWrittenException
write-file-error.message:
I can't write to your game file for some reason!
Please take a look at %s and try again.

update-available.name: OhLookThereIsANewVersionYouCanPlayException
update-available.message: You're currently playing petpet version %s, but version %s is available! If you installed petpet and npm normally, you can update by reinstalling petpet with %s. If you don't want to update, just keep playing! You won't get this error again until you decide to update.

undefined.name: ThereWasAnErrorButWeHaveNoIdeaWhatItWasException
undefined.message:
Something really weird happened. Something caused petpet to run its error handling code,
but didn't actually say what was wrong. This is probably a really serious bug!
You might want to report this error to %s.

%s
